mapper.select:
SELECT t.code ,t.area ,t.salesman ,t.car_store ,t.jb_bank
,t.loan_type ,t.loan_amount ,t.loan_term ,t.real_name ,t.id_kind
,t.id_no ,t.mobile ,t.dc_user ,t.sign_pic ,t.home_pic
,t.id_info ,t.video ,t.dc_report ,t.dc_data ,t.address
,t.rate ,t.fee ,t.urgent ,t.bank ,t.branch
,t.bankcard_no ,t.last_node ,t.fk_pdf ,t.qk_pdf ,t.dk_pdf
,t.sk_pdf ,t.sk_amount ,t.sk_datetime ,t.status ,t.create_datetime
,t.remark ,t.access_level ,t.consume FROM tloan_credit_order t
t.${order}
